resources.string:
Thank you for your participation!
 You will be watching a set of videos one after the other.
 At the end of each video, a rating screen will be presented to you.
 For each video, please provide an overall quality score by choosing on the continuous rating bar.
 If you have any questions please ask them now.
 Click Next to start the training!

Thank you for your participation!
 You will be watching a set of videos one after the other.
 At the end of each video, a rating screen will be presented to you.
 For each video, please provide an overall quality score by choosing on the continuous rating bar.
 If you have any questions please ask them now.
 Click Next to start the Session!
\t\t\tStudy ends!\n Thanks very much for your participation!
